overview: Ignacio Vidaguren joins IMS as the new COO, responsible for expanding IMSâ€™ products and services, developing new revenue opportunities and overseeing the companyâ€™s day-to-day business operations. Ignacioâ€™s background includes an 11-year career at MercadoLibre (NSDQ: MELI) where he served in several executive positions dedicated to sales, marketing and business development and 5 years at McKinsey and Co.
